articles.author: Brian Stelter
articles.title: Video: Stelter warns about the rhetoric coming from Elon Musk at Trump rally | CNN Politics - CNN
articles.description: CNN’s Brian Stelter says the rhetoric Elon Musk used during his appearance at a Trump rally in Butler, Pennsylvania, would lead to “dangerous consequences” for America.
articles.content: CNN's Brian Stelter says the rhetoric Elon Musk used during his appearance at a Trump rally in Butler, Pennsylvania, would lead to "dangerous consequences" for America.
